hiveArticle.title: Have you voted Steem on NetCoins Yet
hiveArticle.body:
I got an email from NetCoins, stating that 

>Dear Coin Nominators and Voters,

 >We just wanted to send out a reminder that voting ends on October 20th, 11:59PM PST! You have few more days left to vote daily so get on it!

This is our chance to do our best and make Steem listed on Netcoins. I have voted again, if you have not done yet please do it now as because today is the last day.

![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmfPxZXkEJgHcd752gFnpv8Ez4g8gUZ1RJTQkGcLHwfFJt)

You can win too because a random voter gets $200 USD Crypto bundle.

![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSiupSuiVa7VebaS1UDHfFm4BUrETTv7mzNnoGkD97Xag)
